StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateMCRISSUser]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@UserID varchar(30), @OrgID int, @OrgType varchar(10), @UserLogin varchar(15) = 'sa' AS
--- DEFINE THE MCC CODE DECLARE @MCC varchar(5)
SET @MCC = CASE @OrgType WHEN 'MEPS' THEN (SELECT MCC_CODE FROM MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP WHERE MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID) ELSE (SELECT MCC_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID) END
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM USER_LIST WHERE USER_ID = @UserID) BEGIN --- UPDATE THE MCC CODE IF THE USER EXISTS UPDATE USER_LIST SET MCC_CODE = @MCC, USER_LOGIN = COALESCE(@UserLogin, SYSTEM_USER, 'sa'), UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE USER_ID = @UserID END ELSE BEGIN --- ADD THE USER ACCOUNT IF IT DOESN'T EXIST INSERT INTO USER_LIST (USER_ID, MCC_CODE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@UserID, @MCC, COALESCE(@UserLogin, SYSTEM_USER, 'sa'), GETDATE()) END
